name: Space Rocks (itch) (adandeith)
description:
This game was made entirely with Python.

How to play :

  • Move around with the left, right, up and down keys to avoid the rocks!
  • Shoot the rocks with the space bar to score some points.

  • When your special attack bar is full, launch a missile with the s key!


Try to beat you score, you will get a colorful surprise!

Install instructions:

The game is only playable on Windows.

Just download and execute Space rocks.exe.
